messages.subject: Re: Penpals
messages.msgSnippet: I just asked my seven year old daughter and she would LOVE!!! (She told me to write it that way, capitols and exclamation points. LOL) another penpal! If you
messages.messageBody:
I just asked my seven year old daughter and she would LOVE!!! (She
told me to write it that way, capitols and exclamation points. LOL)
another penpal!

If you give me your e-mail address, I can send you her name and
address. :-)

~ Joanne ~
Mom to Jacqueline (7), Shawna (11) & Cimion (13)
Adopted into our hearts October 30, 2003
http://anunschoolinglife.blogspot.com/
http://foreverparents.com

<kimandjohn@...> wrote:

the

helpful..thanks

> looking for some penpals and I thought this may be the best place
to
> find some penpals for her! If anyone has any suggestions or if
your
> kids are looking for penpals ~ I'd love some help. Thanks ~
>
> Kim Griffin

messages.subject: Penpals
messages.msgSnippet: Hi! ~ I m a lurker here for the most part : ) My 2 children are on the unschooling path and this list has been tremendously helpful..thanks to all!  I m
messages.messageBody:
Hi! ~ I'm a lurker here for the most part : ) My 2 children are on the
unschooling path and this list has been tremendously helpful..thanks
to all! I'm posting today because I have a 6 yo daughter who is
looking for some penpals and I thought this may be the best place to
find some penpals for her! If anyone has any suggestions or if your
kids are looking for penpals ~ I'd love some help. Thanks ~

Kim Griffin
www.bigyellowbox.net/kc
